attributes.action: Ask Rolf Harris to be the next Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After his magnificent performance on Have I Got News For You, Rolf has shown himself to be more than adequate for the job of Speaker

rejection.details: Members of Parliament vote to decide who is the Speaker. He/she is not appointed by Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
